actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 3 (1d4+1) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Echolocation
special_abilities.desc: The bat can't use its keensense while deafened.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The bat's Perception is 16 when perceiving by hearing.
